Package org.aslib

Interface User

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface User extends Remote
The User interface defines methods for user interactions such as bidding, claiming items, and managing credits.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    claimItem(Item item)
    Claims the specified item.
    int
    getCredits()
    Returns the user's current credit balance.
    String
    getId()
    Returns the user ID.
    List<Item>
    getItems()
    Returns a list of items owned by the user.
    boolean
    makeBid(String auctionId, int bid)
    Places a bid in the auction with the specified ID.
    boolean
    makeBid(Auction auction, int bid)
    Places a bid in the specified auction.
    void
    notify(Auction source, String message)
    Notifies the user with a message from a specified auction.
    boolean
    refillCredits(String code, int amount)
    Refills the user's credits with the specified amount using a code.
    void
    showItems()
    Displays the user's items.
    String
    toReadableString()
    Returns a human-readable string representation of the user.

      Places a bid in the specified auction.
      Parameters:
      auction - the auction to bid in
      bid - the bid amount
      Returns:
      true if the bid is successfully placed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

      Places a bid in the auction with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      auctionId - the ID of the auction to bid in
      bid - the bid amount
      Returns:
      true if the bid is successfully placed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • refillCredits

      boolean refillCredits(String code, int amount) throws RemoteException
      Refills the user's credits with the specified amount using a code.
      Parameters:
      code - the code to use for refilling credits
      amount - the amount of credits to add
      Returns:
      true if the credits are successfully refilled, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
